title: Mutual Agreement
description: I’m Sebastian Hunter, President of the United States. My job and reputation rely on discretion. Those around me know their roles. My rivals can’t wait for me to make a mistake. Now that I’ve met her, they have their chance, and they intend to use it to their full advantage.She and I had an agreement—one and done, but she broke our agreement and I’m left to pick up the pieces and deal with the fallout.This isn’t what I signed up for, but it’s my reality. If I handle this right and hope I don’t lose her in the process.
author: Chiquita Dennie
